contentrichtext.text: '''[[National Unity Government]]s''' are [[coalition government]] made up of all or most parties in a parliament. They are usually formed in times of war or severe political crisis. '''''National Unity''''' is the name of political parties in various countries - * [[National Unity Party (Albania)]] * [[National Unity (Armenia)]] * [[National Unity (Bolivia)]] * [[National Unity (Ireland)]] * [[National Unity (Peru)]] * [[Nasjonal Samling|National Unity (Norway)]] (fascist party 1933-1945) In [[Canada]], debates over [[Quebec separatism]] are often termed "national unity" questions, particularly by [[Canadian federalism|federalists]]. ==See also== *[[National Unity Party (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
